field.name: compId
field.description: CompID assigned to the client

field.name: password
field.description: Password assigned to the CompID

field.name: newPassword
field.description: New password for CompID

field.name: protocolVersion
field.description: Protocol version (1-9)

field.name: ipAddress
field.description: Original IP Address the user

field.name: certifiedSolution
field.description: Nome da solução certificada

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: 0 or 3 = Accepted, 6 = Firm suspended, 9 = Account expired, 50 = Staggered Start, 55 = Node suspended, 100 = Not logged into real-time, 626 = User suspended, 628 = User inactive, 630 = End of Day, 9903 = Concurrent limit, 9904 = Invalid gateway, 9905 = System unavailable, 9906 = Logons not allowed

field.name: passwordExpiry
field.description: Number of days for password expiry, ignore if negative

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: Code specifying the reason for the reject

field.name: rejectReason
field.description: Reason for the reject

field.name: refMessageType
field.description: Type of message rejected

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the rejected message if available

field.name: reason
field.description: Reason for the logout

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Message sequence number of the matching partition

field.name: executionId
field.description: Identifier of the Execution Report. Identifier of the trade being cancelled or corrected if Execution Type is Trade Cancel (H)

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the order, cancel request or modification requests

field.name: orderId
field.description: Server specified identifier of the order

field.name: publicOrderId
field.description: Server specified public order identifier of the order

field.name: executedPrice
field.description: Executed price. Ignore if Execution Type is not Trade (F)

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time the transaction occurred in epoch format

field.name: account
field.description: Identifier of the Trader Account

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: crossId
field.description: Identifier of the cross order. Only alphanumeric values allowed

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Executed quantity. Ignore if Execution Type is not Trade (F)

field.name: leavesQuantity
field.description: Quantity available for further execution

field.name: executionType
field.description: 0 = New, 4 = Cancelled, 5 = Modified, 8 = Rejected, 9 = Suspended, A = Pending New, C = Expired, D = Restated, E = Pending Replace, F = Trade, H = Trade Cancel, L = Triggered

field.name: orderStatus
field.description: 0 = New, 1 = Partially Filled, 2 = Filled, 4 = Cancelled, 6 = Expired, 8 = Rejected, 9 = Suspended, 12 = Pending New, 14 = Pending Replace

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: Code specifying the reason for the reject. Ignore if Execution Type is not Rejected (8)

field.name: workingIndicator
field.description: 0 = Unset, 1 = Order is being worked, 2 = Order is not currently in a working state. Only applicable when Order Status is New (0)

field.name: side
field.description: 1 = Buy, 2 = Sell. When a quote is rejected, field will be set to Buy (1)

field.name: restatementReason
field.description: 0 = GT Corporate Action, 1 = GT Renewal/Restatement, 3 = Order Re-Priced, 8 = Market Option, 100 = Order Replenishment. Only applicable if Exec Type is Restated (D) or unsolicited cancellation

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: indicatorFlags
field.description: Bit 0: Aggressor Indicator (0 = Passive, 1 = Aggressor), Bit 5: RLP (0 = No, 1 = Yes). Applicable only when Exec Type is Trade

field.name: crossType
field.description: 5 = Internal Cross. Any other value rejected

field.name: routingInstruction
field.description: 1 = Retail Liquidity Taker, 2 = Waived Priority, 3 = Broker Only

field.name: tradingPhase
field.description: 1 = Regular, 2 = Non-Regular

field.name: executionVenue
field.description: MIC Code of the instrument as set up under Execution Venue in Reference Data

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Entering Trader ID

field.name: memo
field.description: Free format text field. Echoed in reports

field.name: deskId
field.description: Desk ID through which the order is placed from

field.name: noTradeKey
field.description: Client specified identifier of order relevant to self-execution

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Message sequence number of the matching partition

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the rejected cancel or modification request

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: Code specifying the reason for the reject

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: transactTime
field.description: Time the message was generated in epoch format

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: limitPrice
field.description: Limit price

field.name: orderQuantity
field.description: Total order quantity

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: side
field.description: 1 = Buy, 2 = Sell

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Entering Trader ID

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the order

field.name: account
field.description: Identifier of the Trader Account

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: noTradeKey
field.description: Client specified identifier of order relevant to self-execution

field.name: stopPrice
field.description: Stop price/Trigger price

field.name: displayQuantity
field.description: Maximum quantity to be displayed

field.name: cancelOnDisconnect
field.description: 0 = Do Not Cancel, 1 = Cancel

field.name: anonymity
field.description: 0 = Anonymous, 1 = Named

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: executionInstruction
field.description: Bit 0: Passive Only (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

field.name: routingInstruction
field.description: 1 = Retail Liquidity Taker, 2 = Waived Priority, 3 = Broker Only

field.name: orderType
field.description: 1 = Market, 2 = Limit, 3 = Stop, 4 = Stop Limit, 5 = Market to Limit, 51 = RLP

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: 0 = Day, 3 = IOC, 4 = FOK, 5 = OPG, 8 = GTT, 9 = GFA, 10 = ATC

field.name: expireTime
field.description: Expire time in epoch (seconds precision)

field.name: memo
field.description: Free format text field

field.name: deskId
field.description: Desk ID through which the order is placed from

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the request

field.name: origClientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the order or quote being cancelled

field.name: orderId
field.description: Server specified identifier of the order being cancelled

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: side
field.description: 1 = Buy, 2 = Sell

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: limitPrice
field.description: Limit price. Ignored if Order Type is not Limit (2) or Stop Limit (4)

field.name: orderQuantity
field.description: Total order quantity

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: side
field.description: 1 = Buy, 2 = Sell

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the order

field.name: origClientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the order being modified

field.name: orderId
field.description: Server specified identifier of the order being cancelled

field.name: account
field.description: Identifier of the Trader Account. Required field

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: stopPrice
field.description: Stop price/Trigger price. Ignored if Order Type is not Stop (3) or Stop Limit (4)

field.name: displayQuantity
field.description: Maximum quantity to be displayed. Negative value to ignore

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: executionInstruction
field.description: Bit 0: Passive Only (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

field.name: orderType
field.description: 1 = Market, 2 = Limit, 3 = Stop, 4 = Stop Limit, 5 = Market to Limit, 51 = RLP

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: 0 = Day, 3 = IOC, 4 = FOK, 5 = OPG, 8 = GTT, 9 = GFA, 10 = ATC

field.name: expireTime
field.description: Expire time in epoch (seconds precision). Ignored if Time in Force is not GTT (8)

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition the request relates to

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Sequence number immediately after that of the last message received from the partition

field.name: status
field.description: 0 = Request Accepted, 1 = Request Limit Reached, 2 = Invalid Partition ID, 3 = Service Unavailable

field.name: status
field.description: 0 = All Messages Transmitted, 1 = Message Limit Reached, 3 = Service Unavailable

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition the message relates to

field.name: status
field.description: 1 = Recovery Service Resumed, 2 = Recovery Service Unavailable, 3 = Partition Suspended

field.name: crossId
field.description: Identifier of the cross order. Only alphanumeric values allowed

field.name: limitPrice
field.description: Price of the cross order

field.name: orderQuantity
field.description: Total order quantity of the cross order

field.name: enteringTrader
field.description: Entering Trader ID

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: senderLocation
field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.name: crossType
field.description: 5 = Internal Cross. Any other value rejected

field.name: buySideClientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the buy side. Required

field.name: buySideAccountId
field.description: Identifier of the buyer's trading account. Required

field.name: sellSideClientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the sell side. Required

field.name: sellSideAccountId
field.description: Identifier of the seller's trading account. Required

field.name: orderType
field.description: 2 = Limit. Any other value rejected

field.name: timeInForce
field.description: 0 = Day. Only DAY TIF allowed for cross orders

field.name: deskId
field.description: Desk ID through which the order is placed from

field.name: memo
field.description: Free format text field. Echoed in reports

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Message sequence number of the matching partition

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: Code specifying the reason for the reject. 9000 = Unknown instrument, 9998 = Matching partition suspended, 9999 = System suspended

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the rejected message if available

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the rejected message if available

field.name: massCancelType
field.description: 3 = Firm Interest for Instrument, 4 = Firm Interest for Segment, 7 = All Interest for Client, 8 = All Interest for Firm, 9 = Client Interest for Instrument, 14 = Client Interest for Underlying, 15 = Client Interest for Segment, 22 = Firm Interest for Underlying

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: segment
field.description: Identifier of the segment

field.name: interestType
field.description: 0 = Order, 3 = Quote

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm

field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Message sequence number of the matching partition

field.name: clientOrderId
field.description: Client specified identifier of the rejected message if available

field.description: 0 = Rejected, 7 = Accepted

field.name: rejectCode
field.description: Code specifying the reason for the reject. Ignore if Status is not Rejected (0)

field.name: orderBook
field.description: 1 = Regular

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Message sequence number of the matching partition

field.name: origTime
field.description: Time the announcement was published in EPOCH time

field.name: urgency
field.description: 0 = Rejected, 1 = High Priority, 2 = Low Priority

field.name: headline
field.description: Headline or subject of the announcement

field.name: text
field.description: Text of the announcement

field.name: instruments
field.description: Pipe separated list of symbols of instruments the announcements relates to

field.name: underlyings
field.description: Pipe separated list of symbols of underlyings the instruments relates to

field.name: firmList
field.description: Pipe separated list of firms that the announcement should be sent to

field.name: userList
field.description: Pipe separated list of users that the announcement should be sent to

field.description: Client specified identifier of the message

field.description: Identity of the matching partition

field.description: 0 = Do Not Cancel, 1 = Cancel

field.name: anonymity
field.description: 0 = Anonymous, 1 = Named. Absence interpreted as Anonymous (0)

field.name: account
field.description: Identifier of the trading account. Required field

field.description: Sender Location assigned to the Trader ID/Firm
